Sentencas: Thermodynamics predict high electrical efficiency, when converting methane directly in a fuel cell.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: This is possible in high temperature fuel cells, such as the molten carbonate (MCFC) and the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), utilizing the heat from the electrochemical reaction for the steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: The heat balance is not a limiting factor.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: Internal reforming in a molten carbonate fuel cell involves the risk of alkali poisoning of the catalyst.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: The mechanism of alkali-poisoning is discussed.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: Laboratory tests on alkali containing catalysts are described and data from internal reforming in a MCFC-plant are presented.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: On basis of a simple model, an assessment is made of the required catalyst activity.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING

Sentencas: Only a few percents of the original activity is needed for 95% conversion.
Titulo: INTERNAL STEAM REFORMING IN FUEL-CELLS AND ALKALI POISONING
